about_the_game:
Join our and follow the development, share suggestions and tips to improve the game even more!

The Game

Discover the mysteries of these worlds, each level is like a new game! Can you explore this universe?
Just Shoot has one level for each playable character and some extra stages
(some stages may be variations)



You start the game with a simple weapon, as you advance in the game you will unlock new weapons, characters and items that you will use to make combinations.

Each time you die you lose the weapons and items you collected in the level, but the money earned and the unlocked items remain for you to start a new level and try to break your old record or unlock new characters for your collection!

(Unlocked weapons remain unlocked and can appear in your game normally, as well as the characters and items discovered).

The roguelite element comes in during the level, the enemies will be different, the items that may appear that will make you faster, with more damage, more shots, more life, etc... these items will be random, and by combining certain amounts of items you can forge a super weapon! well... it all depends on getting the right item with the right weapon!

If you are looking for a new game with a rain of bullets essence, lots of enemies, different maps, mysteries, easter eggs, skill testing and item combinations, this game is for you!



And you know what the best thing is? the game is in early access! and we would love to create this game together with the community, so your feedback is very important for us to always improve.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Choose your character and face thousands of monsters as you fight with various weapons, in this casual game with roguelite elements, your choices will change the future and the present!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian
